sections.heading: Introduction
sections.text: Oxlate respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. We believe transparency and trust are essential when handling any data.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.text: When you contact us or engage with our services, we may collect basic information such as your name, email address, phone number, business details, and project requirements. We collect only what is necessary to communicate and deliver our services effectively.

sections.heading: How We Use Information
sections.text: The information we collect is used solely to respond to your inquiries, provide agreed services, communicate project updates, and improve our offerings. We do not use your data for unsolicited marketing.

sections.heading: Data Protection
sections.text: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to safeguard your personal information. Oxlate does not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties unless required by law or with your explicit consent.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.text: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at hello@oxlate.in
